briefdescription.para: Defines the backend writer.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option BACKEND_WRITER Should be either HTML or MD the default value is BackendMarkdown

briefdescription.para: Defined as ${siteUrl}/blob/master/

detaileddescription.para: Used to link local file paths to GitHub URLs Maps to the config option FILE_URL

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables location links to the source.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option HIDE_LOCATION

briefdescription.para: Defines the image lookup directory.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option IMAGE_DIR

briefdescription.para: Defines the output directory for pages.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option OUTPUT_DIR

briefdescription.para: Defines the file extension for pages.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option OUTPUT_FILE_EXT

briefdescription.para: Allows the page brief print to be switched on or off.
Defines a brief description for the current project.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option PROJECT_BRIEF

briefdescription.para: Defines a title for the current project.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option PROJECT_TITLE

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables links to the XML input source file for the current page.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option SHOW_DEBUG

briefdescription.para: Defines the GitHub project URL.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option SITE_URL

briefdescription.para: Defines the MdDox::HtmlDocumentWriter style sheet.

detaileddescription.para: Maps to the config option STYLESHEET

briefdescription.para: Writes all dot files to disk.
Builds the supplied file.
Extracts a Reference object out of the ReferenceTable.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Doxygen::DoxCompoundKindEnum &kind, const String &name, const String &id) const
memberdef.name: insertCompound

briefdescription.para: Adds a new compound reference to the ReferenceTable.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Doxygen::DoxMemberKindEnum &kind, const String &name, const String &id) const
memberdef.name: insertMember

briefdescription.para: Adds a new member reference to the ReferenceTable.
Attempts to load the supplied config file.

detaileddescription.para:
configFile
The path to the file's location.
Uses MdDox::Config to collect configuration options.

briefdescription.para: Registers a dot source.

simplesect.para: The file name the source will be written as.

briefdescription.para: Provides singleton access to the site builder.
The site builder runs the main loop, and provides static access to properties during the build stage.

detaileddescription.para: The application will then branch off and iterate over all individual elements which will invoke writers for each element.
